author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r36631, fix an array looping bug.

author: gstein
msg: The wc-ng work introduces an incompatible value for repos->url during a
transitional period during construction of a copied subtree. This is
detailed in a second errata file (wc002.txt). In this case, the exposure
is zero to very minimal, of what is a buggy value anyways, so we will not
attempt to emulate the old behavior of repos->url in this scenario.
The erroneous value is verified in svn_wc_ensure_adm3(). Instead, we will
relax that assertion to allow the expected URL to match the entry's URL or
(svn_wc_ensure_adm3): relax the assertion a little bit.
